pages.text: As of writing, there are alien creatures in our world. Taxonomically, I consider them a part of Animalia, as they do share similarities, but it is more likely they evolved separately.$(p)Unfortunately, the $(thing)Extinction Event$() also should have wiped out alien life, but it should be possible to restore them in the same way as Animalia.

pages.title: Ender Fossils
pages.text: You should hopefully be able to find and extract the essence from fossils of alien creatures.$(p)I should note, however, that the raw fossil will come in handy as well; alien bones glow and seem to have magical properties.
I call this powder $(item)Ender Dust$(). Using this it's possible to create all manner of contraptions which will interact with the soulus of creatures past.
$(p)$(l:summoning/soulbook)Next, I will show how to create the Soulbook.$()
